description:
My place is close to the train station which is 3 blocks away and will have you in the Manhattan in less than 20 minutes. A few blocks away from Lincoln Terrace park.  You’ll love my place because a
train stop away at Franklin Avenue there is the Brooklyn museum and Brooklyn Botanical Gardens  as well as a variety of new restaurants. . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).
name: Authentic Bklyn location with Caribbean vibes
